entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
